# Malbec
## Rundown
- Big 4
    - Medium-High Body
    - Highest Fruit
    - Medium Tannins
    - Medium-Low Acidity
- Subgroups

## Dukes Wines and Distinctions
    - Tentadora
        - Valle de Cafayate, Argentina
        - Blueberry and blackberry melange with notes of spice and earth that broadens into a velvety finish
